      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

        Starts the dbxtract app.

        usage: java -jar dbxtract.jar --config
        [--handler-add |
        --handler-delete |
        --list | --source-add |
        --source-delete | --source-interval |
        --start] [--monitor ] 

         --config                         configuration file pathname
 --handler-add     add new handler to an existing
                                        datasource (i.e. handler-add
                                        myds com.cdc.MyHandler)
 --handler-delete  remove handler from datasource
                                        (i.e. handler-delete myds com.cdc.MyHandler)
 --list                                 list configuration parameters and values
 --monitor                        monitoring port number (default: 9000)
 --source-add  add new datasource --source-delete 
 remove datasource --source-interval  set datasource scan
 interval --start start dbxtract agent

        Parameters:
        args -
